stewardship.translation[0].definitions[0: someone’s stewardship of something is the way that they control or protect it
Some critics have doubts about his stewardship of the nation.
The farm was quite a different place under Mom’s stewardship.
stewardship.translation[1].definitions[0: the way in which someone controls and takes care of an organization or event
He said that the firm, under the stewardship of his assistants, would suffer no disruptions.
